skills.name: Kept detailed records of all work done in a central ticket-based system

Joined a team of 19 people world-wide as part of Hewlett-Packard’s 3rd Party Support Department; In this position I maintained a greater than 90% first call resolution rate while fielding a broad range of hardware, software and networking issues

Became known within this advanced 3rd Party Support Department as a “guru”, and was relied upon unofficially by many of the 2000 people in the call centre, including Senior Technical Agents from all departments
Created comprehensive processes and documentation in an easy to understand format
Maintained focus on customer service and metrics in a high stress envronmemt
